own.map:
(doc)->
 if doc? and doc.owner? and doc.owner.length? and doc.owner.length > 0
  emit doc.owner, doc

singleDocument.map:
(doc)->
 if doc? and doc.owner? and doc.owner.length? and doc.owner.length > 0 and doc._id?
  emit doc.owner + doc._id, doc

boat.map:
(doc)->
 if doc? and doc.boat? and doc.owner.length? and doc.owner.length > 0 and doc.boat.length? and doc.boat.length > 0
  emit "#{doc.owner}#{doc.boat}", doc

validate_doc_update:
(newDoc,oldDoc,userCtx)->
 if oldDoc? and !newDoc._deleted? and newDoc.owner isnt oldDoc.owner
  throw forbidden: 'old and new user dont match'
